item.title: Building lightweight AI news dashboards
item.dc:creator: smol contributors
item.description: We explored how minimal tooling can still deliver a delightful, bilingual news reader powered by large language models.
item.content:encoded:
The smol.ai community has been experimenting with micro dashboards that deliver just the right amount of context for AI-curated news.

By combining RSS, server-side caching, and modern CSS techniques, builders can ship fast without heavyweight frameworks.

item.title: Prompt engineering tips from the community
item.dc:creator: Jane Doe
item.description: A curated list of practical prompt engineering tricks gathered from builders in the smol.ai Discord.
item.content:encoded:
The community shared examples of prompts that improve summarisation fidelity, multilingual output, and structured JSON responses.

These lessons informed the bilingual summary agent used in this demo.
